div.p: A code in unitId that uniquely identifies the repository responsible for intellectual control of the materials being described.

Use repositoryCode in unitId to provide a number or code that uniquely identifies the repository responsible for intellectual control of the materials being described. The code should be taken from ISO/DIS 15511 Information and documentationâ€”International Standard Identifier for Libraries and Related Organizations (ISIL), or another code as specified in repositoryEncoding in control.
